Package org.sosy_lab.java_smt.api

Interface QuantifiedFormulaManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractQuantifiedFormulaManager
public interface QuantifiedFormulaManager
This interface contains methods for working with any theory with quantifiers.

ATTENTION: Not every theory has a quantifier elimination property!

    • eliminateQuantifiers

      BooleanFormula eliminateQuantifiers​(BooleanFormula pF) throws InterruptedException, SolverException
      Eliminate the quantifiers for a given formula. If this is not possible, it will return the input formula. Note that CVC4 only supports this for LIA and LRA.
      Parameters:
      pF - Formula with quantifiers.
      Returns:
      New formula without quantifiers.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
      SolverException
